<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085958</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Classroom environment: the basics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassenzimmerumgebung: die Grundlagen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Environnement de salle de classe : les 
fondations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ambiente da sala de aula: os princípios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ambiente dell'aula: i principi fondamentali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιβάλλον τάξεων: τα βασικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ambiente de la sala de clase: los 
fundamentos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Your classroom is "home away from home" for you and your students. Make it attractive, comfortable, and functional.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ihr Klassenzimmer ist "weg vom Haus" für Sie und 
Ihre Kursteilnehmer Haupt. Bilden Sie es attraktiv, bequem, und 
funktionell.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Votre salle de classe est "à la maison loin de la
maison" pour vous et vos étudiants. Rendez-l'attrayante, 
confortable, et fonctionnelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sua sala de aula é "home afastado da HOME" para 
você e seus estudantes. Faça-a atrativa, confortável, e 
funcional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La vostra aula è "domestica via dalla sede" per 
voi ed i vostri allievi. Rendala attraente, comoda e funzionale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τάξη σας είναι "σπίτι μακρυά από το σπίτι" για σας
και τους σπουδαστές σας. Τον καταστήστε ελκυστικό, άνετο, 
και λειτουργικό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Su sala de clase es "casera lejos de hogar" para 
usted y sus estudiantes. Hágala atractiva, cómoda, y 
funcional.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

    </metadata>
